 OOC: All right people lets try and stop arguing amongst ourselves. When I 
played this rpg there was never a council member(well it was yan then) who 
said dont post while im gone. So I apologize for continuing,  posting back in 
the day we just kept going and the person had to catch up. I think the 
council needs a little meeting to deal with all these problems. I really 
didn't give my characters a proper introduction either and for that im sorry 
I just felt it was a good way to further a story line. Such as Proto joining 
Megatron's ranks and The Rodimus Prime vs. Galvatron feud which I am really 
looking forward to.

--part1_80.1e00c156.2a59b0bb_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

So I apologize for continuing,  posting back in the day we just kept going and the person had to catch up. I think the council needs a little meeting to deal with all these problems. I really didn't give my characters a proper introduction either and for that im sorry I just felt it was a good way to further a story line. Such as Proto joining Megatron's ranks and The Rodimus Prime vs. Galvatron feud which I am really looking forward to.</B></FONT></HTML>
